content.raw:
the jenkins builds all failed:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=1000)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1000/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1000/

maybe it would help if you restored the previous syntax here:

~~~
#elif (OGRE_VERSION < ((1 << 16) | (9 << 8) | 0))
~~~

it's harder to read, but I think the original syntax is saying "if OGRE_VERSION is less than 1.9.0"

the jenkins builds all failed:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1000/

maybe it would help if you restored the previous syntax here:

#elif (OGRE_VERSION < ((1 << 16) | (9 << 8) | 0))

it's harder to read, but I think the original syntax is saying "if OGRE_VERSION is less than 1.9.0"
